Uses of Package
io.micronaut.build.services

  • Packages that use io.micronaut.build.services 
    Package Description
    io.micronaut.build  
    io.micronaut.build.aot  
    io.micronaut.build.services  
    io.micronaut.build.testresources  
  • Classes in io.micronaut.build.services used by io.micronaut.build 
    Class and Description
    ApplicationConfigurationService
    Parses the Micronaut application configuration.
    CompilerService
    Provides methods to compile a Maven project.
    DependencyResolutionService
    Utility methods for performing dependency resolution.
    DockerService
    Provides methods to work with Docker images.
    ExecutorService
    Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
    JibConfigurationService
    Exposes the Jib plugin configuration so that it can be read by other mojos.
  • Classes in io.micronaut.build.services used by io.micronaut.build.aot 
    Class and Description
    CompilerService
    Provides methods to compile a Maven project.
    DependencyResolutionService
    Utility methods for performing dependency resolution.
    ExecutorService
    Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
  • Classes in io.micronaut.build.services used by io.micronaut.build.services 
    Class and Description

    Provides methods to execute goals on the current project.
  • Classes in io.micronaut.build.services used by io.micronaut.build.testresources
